statement:
jaod.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
jaod.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th -> ch ) ) $.
jaod $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ps \/ th ) -> ch ) ) $.
